Let the hard-pressed, sorely tried one say, "Though He slay me, yet will I trust in Him." "Although the fig tree 
                                                                           318
shall not blossom, neither shall fruit be in the vines; the labor of the olive shall fail, and the fields shall yield no meat; the flock shall be cut off from the fold, and there shall be no herd in the stalls: yet I will rejoice in the Lord, I will joy in the God of my salvation." Job 13:15; Habakkuk 3:17, 18.
